story.headline: CEE currently rates overall model quality at 7/10 (high). The model includes 2 explicit decision options. Team input from 3 participants has been summarised. Some response lists were capped; review risks and next actions before treating this as final.

3 evidence items were scored for strength and relevance.
3 team perspectives contributed to this view.
risks_and_gaps: CEE reported validation issues for this result; check them before treating it as final.

next_actions: Review the validation issues surfaced by CEE and address structural problems before committing.
